,8.96,21.1,0.6975820004349631,0.8258961228968544,['New Garden Township, Pennsylvania, Property Tax for Kennet Library Measure (November 2024)']","['“Do you favor increasing New Garden Township’s existing Real Estate Property Tax dedicated to Kennet Library by 0.100 mills, for a total of 0.200 mills, with the revenue from such increase to be used exclusively to fund the operation of the Kennet\xa0Library? The current real estate property tax is 2.77 mills.”']","# Ballot for Chester County, Pennsylvania
## New Garden Township, Pennsylvania, Property Tax for Kennet Library Measure (November 2024)

“Do you favor increasing New Garden Township’s existing Real Estate Property Tax dedicated to Kennet Library by 0.100 mills, for a total of 0.200 mills, with the revenue from such increase to be used exclusively to fund the operation of the Kennet Library? The current real estate property tax is 2.77 mills.”

## New Garden Township, Pennsylvania, Property Tax for Kennet Library Measure (November 2024)

“Do you favor increasing New Garden Township’s existing Real Estate Property Tax dedicated to Kennet Library by 0.100 mills, for a total of 0.200 mills, with the revenue from such increase to be used exclusively to fund the operation of the Kennet Library? The current real estate property tax is 2.77 mills.”
